title: [Massive] Co-Occurring Dialogue Strategies for Building MBA Collaborative Learning Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Basic business administration knowledge and group activity experience
context.additional_context: Considering differences in learning styles based on learners' gender and major (business/non-business)

learning_goals: In collaborative learning environments, learners can practice effective communication strategies using synchronous dialogue.
Learners enhance their ability to analyze business scenarios based on peer feedback
Learners recognize their learning styles (sensing/intuition) and apply them to team projects
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
